reviewText:
love the Lamperts. I have danced for years, and I teach dance. I watch these DVD's because no one does a better job of teaching, so I use the DVD's to help me organize dance lessons.
There was a spot in the DVD that didn't work. Dance Lovers sent out another one, and I had it in 3 days.
It's an older couple with some old, hilarious sayings, and the video quality is poor, but they are great instructors.
The video quality is not that great. But the dancing lessons are good and thorough to follow. I have bought several of these videos and the lessons are detailed and really good.
You won't go wrong with any dance instruction given by Foster Lambert. He is easy to follow and demonstrates the steps in such a way that you can see the footwork.
